import React from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addToCart } from "../../lib/state/actions"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Product = ({ id, name, price, category, brand }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const addToCartAction = () => dispatch(addToCart({id, name, price})); return (
{/* */}
) } export default Product
